page.title: 16The Games We Play.
page.content: CHARGE. Charge is a game that you need quite a lot of people for .Choose one person to go in the middle of the area you are playing in.You need quite a lot of space.Say the person you have chosen is called Sarah,Sarah has to call out someones name or say "Charge" .If Sarah says charge then everyone has to try and run across without being caught. If someone gets caught,they have to help Sarah to catch the other people .When everyone is caught ,the game ends. The first person who was caught in the previous game is it for the next game. If the person who was chosen to run across from one side to the other makes it,all the other people have to run across without being caught. It is a great game to play at playtimes.
